questionTitle: He would pass the contest ............ he didn't drink alcohol.
You must .................... many opportunities to practise speaking English.
This is a very difficult question. You should ............ the teacher's explanation.
Why don't you ............ this opportunity to clear up all the misunderstandings between you and your friend?
Jane took a taxi, she still arrived late for the concert.
On arrival at the airport, please go straight to the ......................
Most people consider it discourteous and inconvenient to arrive .................... an important appointment later than the time agreed upon.
This machine ..................... gold since it was invented 20 years ago.
We decided to leave early for the picnic ................ we wouldn't get home late.
It was ................ a boring film that we left before the end .
What did the man need ................... a fire?
Someone should tell him ................ noise in class again.
A great deal of time ...................... spent for his exercise yesterday.
I last read the book ...................... a long time that I have now forgotten what it is about.
the weather is warm and damp, rice grows very well here.
I found a place .................. but it was difficult.
We should learn all the new words by heart in order to ............ our vocabulary.
The pupils left their bicycle leaning ............ the wall.
